Tag_Youmay.description: the memory of Kassandra | Aristophanes' [[The Knights (play) | play]] of the same name

MemoryInfobox.description: 'With the The Knights (play)|play complete and the people aware of Kleon's plan for Mytilene, Kassandra returned to Sokrates to find out what the next step was.'

General_Description: '''The Knights''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra returned to speak to [[Aristophanes]] and [[Sokrates]] after their successful attempt to damage [[Kleon]]'s reputation.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra met with Aristophanes and Sokrates at the meeting room in [[Perikles' Residence]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So, what's next?''
*'''Aristophanes:''' ''The [[The Knights (play)|play]] was a great success, as I knew it would be. With that and the proof you presented at the [[Pnyx]], Kleon has lost much of his popularity.''
*'''Sokrates:''' ''Now he heads to [[Amphipolis]] in an effort to redeem himself.''
[[File:ACOD The Knights 2.png|thumb|250px|A messenger asking Kassandra to meet Brasidas]]
A man rushed into the room.
*'''Civilian:''' ''Kassandra! [[Brasidas]] sent me to find you. He's alive and well.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where is he now?''
*'''Civilian:''' ''Amphipolis. They're preparing for [[Battle of Amphipolis|battle]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If you reach him before I do, tell him I'm on the way.''
*'''Sokrates:''' ''So what are you going to do?''

<tabber>
|-|I'm going to kill Kleon.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Kleon dies now. This is our chance.''
*'''Sokrates:''' ''The plan is already working. Death shouldn't be brought early, even to someone like Kleon.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He's ''exactly'' the type death should come early to. Not all who live deserve to grow old, Sokrates.''
*'''Sokrates:''' ''And you decide who deserves it?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This time I do.''
Sokrates sighed as Kassandra prepared to leave the room.
*'''Sokrates:''' ''Then safe travels.''
|-|I'm going to help Brasidas.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Brasidas needs my help. I plan on giving it to him. Though should our paths cross, I won't hesitate to kill Kleon.''
Kassandra prepared to leave.
*'''Sokrates:''' ''Whatever you decide, remember he is only a man.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I can't promise anything.''
*'''Sokrates:''' ''Be safe.''
</tabber>
Kassandra left.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra learned that Brasidas had survived the [[Battle of Pylos]] and sought her aid for the upcoming Battle of Amphipolis, which she accepted and promptly travelled to.
Section_Trivia: *The name of the memory is a reference to the historical play, also titled ''[[The Knights (play)|The Knights]]'', which was the fourth play written by [[Aristophanes]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
